Title: 41750 - # Summer DIY Home Decor Ideas
Direction: 500 words - Make a list of 3-6 summer decoration ideas that someone can DIY. You should list instructions on how to do the project as well. To accomodate the anchor text and url you can talk about DIY lighting ideas, such as creating your own decorative string lights for a summery back yard. Your audience consist of people interested in DIY projects.

Title: 41751 - Summer Nights: Tips for Throwing The Best Summer Bash
Direction: 500 words- Make a list of 3-6 tips for decor, food, games, etc. for throwing the best summer party. To accommodate the anchor text and url you can talk about different types of decorative lighting. You audience consists of males/dad's with families, and people who are interested in party hosting tips.
